DataElement.preferredName: Diagnostic Procedure Adult Comorbidity Evaluation Performed  Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the status of the numeric score of the Adult Comorbidity Evaluation-27(ACE-27), a 27-item comorbidity index for patients with cancer, as a test performed to diagnose disease, disordered function, or disability used for stratification purposes.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Diagnostic Procedure Adult Comorbidity Evaluation Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the Adult Comorbidity Evaluation-27(ACE-27), a 27-item comorbidity index for patients with cancer, as a test performed to diagnose disease, disordered function, or disability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Methods, procedures, and tests performed to diagnose disease, disordered function, or disability.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure or test to diagnose a disease or disorder.

Property.preferredDefinition: A human who has reached reproductive age.:The coexistence of two or more disease processes.:Evaluation; the act of placing value on something.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of humans who have reached reproductive age.
The coexistence of two or more disease processes.
Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Diagnostic Procedure Adult Comorbidity Evaluation Status
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the status as related to the number or range of numeric values measured by the Adult comorbidity evaluation used for stratification purposes.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Adult Comorbidity Evaluation Twenty Seven Greater Than or Equal To Grade Two

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Adult Comorbidity Evaluation Twenty Seven Greater Than or Equal To Grade Two
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A human who has reached reproductive age.: The coexistence of two or more disease processes.: Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.: A natural number greater than nineteen and less than twenty-one and the quantity that it denotes.: A natural number greater than 6 and less than 8 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of six and one.: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.: A position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality.: A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of humans who have reached reproductive age.
The coexistence of two or more disease processes.
Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.
A natural number greater than nineteen and less than twenty-one and the quantity that it denotes.
A natural number greater than 6 and less than 8 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of six and one.

A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
A position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality.
A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A human who has reached reproductive age.: The coexistence of two or more disease processes.: Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.: A natural number greater than nineteen and less than twenty-one and the quantity that it denotes.: A natural number greater than 6 and less than 8 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of six and one.: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: A position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality.: A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.
